email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, could we push the laycan to 17-22 October? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Let me know if these adjustments are feasible. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to 17-22 October. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $20,000 per day. If this works for you, I can draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement at $51.00 per metric ton, laycan 17-22 October, and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Thanks for your flexibility. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Draft
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the draft charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah
